description.value: When wielding two guns, can fire both at the same point as a Full Action, make one BS Test, on success, target's AP counts as normal, but toughness only counts once against the combined damage roll. A successful dodge avoids attack.

specialAbilities.description: Full Action: Fire both pistols at same target with one BS test. Combined damage ignores TB once. Dodge avoids entire attack.
